title: Phone Sex: Erotic Fetishes and Sexual Fantasies
description: Sydney is a crooner, a moaner, a sigher, and her ooohhs and aaahhs are paid by the minute. She's a voice actress. And she's really good... When Sydney found out about a lucrative career that will make use of her seductive, purry, naughty voice, she did not hesitate on cashing in. She became so good that she left her work in a bank and freelanced as a phone sex operator. She's a good business woman -- and a talented voice actress. There's nothing that gives her more thrill than making the men lining up on the other side, and her bulging purse, very, very happy. Can't stand the suspense? Download and find out what happens next!READER ADVISORY: HOW PLEASUREFUL DO YOU LIKE YOUR STORIES? This story contains content that some readers may find objectionable. This includes sex, extended orgasms, and erotic themes. All of the characters are 18 years of age or older.
author: Sandra Ross
